reporting-org.narrative: International Network for Bamboo and Rattan

title.narrative: Conduct 3 national market assessments for Ethiopia, Kenya and Uganda, primarily aimed at identifying bamboo value chains with big potential for upscaling

description.narrative: The market studies will focus mainly on domestic markets, with a long-term view to supporting East African bamboo producers export their products regionally as well as to the EU. For the studies, national experts and chinese expert teams, consisting of a bamboo agronomist, a bamboo engineer/technologist, and a bamboo value chain and livelihood specialist, will work with the following national and Dutch partners in each country. 3 market study reports will be the key outputs of this activity. A value chain analysis and market assessment of bamboo products in Ethiopia was completed. The report was published online and can be found at http://resource.inbar.int/upload/file/1528002396.pdf A value chain analysis and market assessment of bamboo products in Kenya was completed. The report was published online and can be found at http://resource.inbar.int/upload/file/1527834159.pdf A value chain analysis and market assessment of bamboo products in Uganda was completed and can be found at http://resource.inbar.int/upload/file/1527834301.pdf

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Environment, Natural Resources, and Climate Change, Ethiopia

activity-date.narrative: Data collection has started in all three countries. Draft reports will be avilable by mid May, 2017.
